comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Oh wow, so you are good at trading yet for some reason you don't have any money?I mean, you could just have only $50 and manage to multiply it within hours as you claim. If it was that easy and obvious, then why are you scouring through the forums looking for your next potential victims

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: carlitos711 on November 13, 2023, 03:21:33 PMGood afternoon, maybe I didn't understand it since it is a delicate topic and I suppose I create confusion.I have capital but it is not very comfortable for me since I have to withdraw daily and that has hindered my progress. They recommended that I ask for a loan or offer my experience as a service and I think I have done it wrong because I have negative comments. We all know that a smaller account takes time to rise, however, a larger account generates the desired journal faster, that's all. On my part, if my publication looks bad, some admin can delete it, but even if I was wrong, it is a matter of saying it, thank you.If you are so skilled, why are you also selling amazon gift cards here?Really curious.Anyway, trust me when I tell you, nobody will EVER fall for this, so you can give up already and close this thread. Any reply is just a waste of your time and the time of others reading it. So do us the favour ....
